front.title: Requirements for support of Diff-Serv-aware MPLS Traffic Engineering

abstract.t: This document defines the requirements for support of Diff-Serv- aware MPLS Traffic Engineering on a per-Class-Type basis, as discussed in the Traffic Engineering Working Group Framework document [TEWG-FW]. A companion document [DIFF-TE-EXT] proposes actual extensions to OSPF, ISIS, RSVP and CR-LDP in order to meet those requirements.
